data.comment: The first-half is under way at Oakwell Ground - Barnsley kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 26, An attacking Barnsley player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
At Oakwell Ground, Rob Dickie is shown a red card and sent off.
Goal! Cauley Woodrow gives Barnsley the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a first substitution, with Conor Masterson replacing Ilias Chair.
In the minute 37, It's now 2-0 in Barnsley as Conor Chaplin scores for Barnsley.
The first half has been concluded at Oakwell Ground.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. QPR kick-off.
In the minute 46, Matty James is replacing Clarke Oduor for the home team.
Mark Warburton is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Todd Kane replacing Albert Adomah.
The away team have replaced Macauley Bonne with Chris Willock. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
In the minute 64, Own goal! Yoann Barbet scores in his own net to make it 3-0.
Patrick Schmidt is on a sub for Cauley Woodrow for Barnsley.
Elliot Simoes is replacing Dominik Frieser for Barnsley at Oakwell Ground.
Andy Davies blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
